DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy ultrasonography ( US ) -guided radiofrequency ablation liver tumor , investigator use preoperative postoperative US/CEUS ( contrast-enhanced ultrasonography ) /CT/MRI assess lesion , laboratory test include tumor marker evaluate general condition patient . Intraoperative US/CEUS/CT would apply monitor ablation lesion .
